levelList.name: Hasretli - Mircalla
levelList.desc:
Bu birimin HP'si bu Yetenek kullanılırken 1'in altına düşmez.
Bu birimin her 100 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] için Çarpışma Gücü +1 (maksimum 2)
[BeforeAttack] 50'den az [BloodDinner] olduğunda, her Vuruşta 1 [Laceration] uygular
[EndSkill] 3 tur boyunca, Tur Sonunda 10 SP kaybeder.

coindescs.desc: Her [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation] için %0.1 daha fazla hasar verir (maksimum %10)
100+ [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation] olduğunda: her bir değer için %0.1 daha fazla hasar verir (maksimum %10)
200+ [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation] olduğunda: her bir değer için %0.1 daha fazla hasar verir (maksimum %20)
300+ [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation] olduğunda: her bir değer için %0.1 daha fazla hasar verir (maksimum %30)
[WinDuelAttack] En yüksek Arzu A-Rezonansı baz alınarak [ThirstyRose] uygular. (maksimum 3)

levelList.name: Sevgi ve Nefret Adına - Major Arcana Slave!!!
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply 1 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / 3)) random other allies (max 3 allies)

[BeforeAttack] Gain +([Charge] - 1) Atk Weight (max 3)

[EndSkill] Consume all [Charge] Count on self to heal (2 + (Envy Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP percentages by ([Charge] Count consumed)% HP (max 5 allies, max 5%)

[EndSkill] If this unit is Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackHead] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn

levelList.name: Sevgi ve Nefret Adına - Major Arcana Slave!!!
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply 1 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / 3)) random other allies (max 3 allies)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], apply 2 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / 3)) random other allies instead (max 3 allies)</style>

[BeforeAttack] Gain +([Charge] - 1) Atk Weight (max <style="highlight">5</style>)
[EndSkill] Consume all [Charge] Count on self to heal (2 + (Envy Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP percentages by ([Charge] Count consumed)% HP (max 5 allies, max <style="highlight">8</style>%)

[EndSkill] If this unit is Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackHead] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn

levelList.name: Sevgi ve Nefret Adına - Major Arcana Slave!!!
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply 1 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / <style="highlight">2</style>)) random other allies (max <style="highlight">4</style> allies)
- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], apply 2 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / <style="highlight">2</style>)) random other allies instead (max <style="highlight">4</style> allies)

[BeforeAttack] Gain +([Charge] - 1) Atk Weight (max 5)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], gain +([Charge]) Atk Weight instead (max 5)</style>

[EndSkill] Consume all [Charge] Count on self to heal (2 + (Envy Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP percentages by ([Charge] Count consumed)% HP (max 5 allies, max <style="highlight">10</style>%)

[EndSkill] If this unit is Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], inflict +1 [Burst] Count</style>

levelList.name: Maksimize Tersine Arcana Slave - Nefretin Silinişi
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain +([Charge]) Atk Weight (max 5)

[BeforeAttack] Consume all [Charge] Count and deal +1% more damage for every [Charge] Count consumed (max 20%)

[BeforeAttack] If the main target has [VillainMark], deal +3% damage for every [Charge] (max 15%)

[BeforeAttack] Deal +5% damage for every 3 Envy Reson. (max 10%, rounded down)

[BeforeAttack] Base Power -12 for every Cracked Coin (max -24)

[EndSkill] If this unit is a Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [HystericGauge]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn
